Body:
""" Run the parameter setup script
    """
regions = [':10', '30:60', '80:', ':10,35:65,80:', '10:20;', '10:20,']
result = [[np.array([], dtype=np.int), np.array([99], dtype=np.int)], [np.
    array([299], dtype=np.int), np.array([598], dtype=np.int)], [np.array([
    798], dtype=np.int), np.array([], dtype=np.int)], [np.array([349, 798],
    dtype=np.int), np.array([99, 648], dtype=np.int)], [], [np.array([99],
    dtype=np.int), np.array([199], dtype=np.int)]]
resstat = [0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 2]
nslits = 2
maxsl = 100
for rr, reg in enumerate(regions):
    status, regs = skysub.read_userregions(reg, nslits, maxslitlength=maxsl)
    if status != 1:
        assert len(regs) == nslits
        assert np.array_equal(np.where(regs[0][1:] & ~regs[0][:-1])[0],
            result[rr][0])
        assert np.array_equal(np.where(~regs[0][1:] & regs[0][:-1])[0],
            result[rr][1])
    assert status == resstat[rr]
